name: Don't Tap The White Tile!
description:
This is a super fun and highly addictive game that tests your reflexes against time and movement.
No special skills needed, all this game asks of you is an attentive mind and fast fingers!

1 simple rule: Don't tap the white tile

2 modes:
> Classic: try to go as fast as you can
> Rush: try to survive as long as you can
